meanings.sent1: The new painting was much artier than the old one.
meanings.sent2: She always chooses the artier designs for her projects.
meanings.sent3: The artier decorations made the party feel more lively.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like an artier canvas, full of vibrant ideas.
meanings.sent5: The artier approach to problem-solving sparked new inspiration.

meanings.definition: Having more skill or expertise in a particular art form
meanings.sent1: His artier techniques set him apart from other painters.
meanings.sent2: The artier sculptor crafted intricate masterpieces.
meanings.sent3: The artier chef could turn simple ingredients into gourmet dishes.
meanings.sent4: Her dance moves were as artier as a seasoned professional.
meanings.sent5: The artier musician played with unmatched precision and flair.

meanings.sent1: She chose the artier outfit for the fashion show.
meanings.sent2: The artier accessories completed her trendy look.
meanings.sent3: His artier sense of style always turned heads.
meanings.sent4: The artier shoes made a bold fashion statement.
meanings.sent5: Wearing the artier jacket made her feel confident and chic.
